title: Hmanlai Farawa bawihte kha
lyrics:
Hmanlai Farawa bawihte kha,
Pathianin a hruai chhuak;
A thiltihtheihzia entir nan,
Tuipui luang a chawlhtir.
Engkimin an awih thin,
Engkimin an awih thin;
Isua hnenah hlauh tur a awm lo,
Engkimin a thupek an awih thin.
Sualin ka rilru a tibuai,
Setana thupekin;
Mahse, Lalpan min thlamuan a,
Ka buaina a tireh.
Kawng hlauhawmah kal mah ila,
Lalpa hniakhnung ka zui;
Khawngaih thahruiin min hruai a,
Ram ro ka pelh hma chuan.
Lal Isu, ka hnuk chah hunin,
I ram eng ka hmu ang;
He khawvel buai hlauhawm ata,
I ram min hruai kai ang.
